dcterms:description: A crowdsourced dataset where users trace lines, resulting in a sequence of lines created by five hundred individuals, showcasing the imperfections accumulated through iterative tracing.
dcterms:title: A Sequence of Lines Traced by Five Hundred Individuals

dcterms:description: A crowdsourced dataset where users trace circles, resulting in a sequence of circles created by five hundred individuals, highlighting the cumulative imperfections in the tracing process.
dcterms:title: A Sequence of Circles Traced by Five Hundred Individuals

dcterms:description: An artistic project where users are tasked to copy simple line drawings, resulting in a large-scale structure of organic patterns through evolutionary effects.
dcterms:title: Seed Drawing

dcterms:creator: A. Basanta
dcterms:description: An installation that uses custom software to randomize the settings of two scanners, capturing altered mixes of light and creating prints based on a database of images.
dcterms:title: All We’d Ever Need Is One Another

dcterms:creator: M. Donnarumma
dcterms:description: A performance art piece that explores the relationship between humans and technology through the use of robotic prostheses and real-time biomimetic algorithms.
dcterms:title: Eingeweide

dcterms:creator: RyBN
dcterms:description: A project documenting the historical use of human beings in computational architectures, showcasing the role of human labor in AI.
dcterms:title: Human Computers

dcterms:creator: T. Kihara
dcterms:description: An online work that simulates YouTube landing pages with recommended videos for fictional profiles, highlighting the implications of recommendation algorithms.
dcterms:title: TheirTube

dcterms:creator: G. Segni
dcterms:description: A project that critiques the trend of automating artistic output by delegating part of the artistic production to GANs based on periods of unproductivity.
dcterms:title: Demand Full Laziness: A Five-Year Plan

dcterms:creator: S. Sedlaček
dcterms:description: A project that contextualizes visitors' non-work with the crypto economy, rewarding them for being still through a custom cryptocurrency.
dcterms:title: Oblomo
